original_text: when the army of the king of Babylon was fighting against Jerusalem and against all the cities of Judah that were left, Lachish and Azekah, for these were the only fortified cities of Judah that remained.
korean_text: 그 때에 바벨론의 왕의 군대가 예루살렘과 유다의 남은 모든 성읍들을 쳤으니 곧 라기스와 아세가라 유다의 견고한 성읍 중에 이것들만 남았음이더라

sentences.original_text: when the army of the king of Babylon was fighting against Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕의 군대가 예루살렘을 칠 때에

sentences.original_text: and against all the cities of Judah that were left
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 남아있던 유다의 모든 성읍들을 치고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: for these were the only fortified cities of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 이 성읍들이 유다의 유일한 견고한 성읍들이었기 때문이다
